# pose

**Instance Property**

The 2D position and rotation of the equipment relative to the equipment parent, or table.

## Declaration

```swift
var pose: TableVisualState.Pose2D
```

## Rendering the equipment

- **boundingBox**: A 3D bounding box that encloses the card.

items.description: A 3D bounding box that encloses the card.
items.name: boundingBox
